amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $375,000,000 for the Department of Veterans Affairs for Medical Care for costs of medical care for certain veterans of the current conflict in Iraq.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 459 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 459 proposed by Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S4747-4752, S4762; text: CR S4747) To appropriate an additional $375,000,000 for the Department of Veterans Affairs for Medical Care for costs of medical care for certain veterans of the current conflict in Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 459 proposed by Senator Graham FL.
